ClassDef.Name: UIField

Properties.Name: PositionOffset
Properties.Description: The offset of the UI element in pixels.

Properties.Name: PositionRelative
Properties.Description: The position of the UI element relative to its parent.

Properties.Name: Rotation
Properties.Description: The rotation of the UI element in degrees.

Properties.Name: SizeOffset
Properties.Description: The size offset of the UI element in pixels.

Properties.Name: SizeRelative
Properties.Description: The size of the UI element relative to its parent.

Properties.Name: ClipDescendants
Properties.Description: Determines whether the UI element clips its descendants.

Properties.Name: PivotPoint
Properties.Description: The pivot point of the UI element.

Properties.Name: Scale
Properties.Description: The scale of the UI element.

Properties.Name: Visible
Properties.Description: Determines whether the UI element is visible.

Properties.Name: MaskMode
Properties.Description: Determines the mask mode of the UI element.

Properties.Name: AbsoluteSize
Properties.Description: The absolute size of the UI element in pixels.

Properties.Name: IsVisibleInTree
Properties.Description: Indicates whether the UI element is visible in the UI hierarchy.

Events.Name: MouseEnter
Events.Description: Fires when user's cursor hovers on this UI

Events.Name: MouseExit
Events.Description: Fires when user's cursor leaves this UI

Events.Name: MouseDown
Events.Description: Fires when user hold down mouse on this UI

Events.Name: MouseUp
Events.Description: Fires when user release mouse on this UI

Events.Name: TransformChanged
Events.Description: Fires when this UI transform has been changed

Events.Name: VisibilityChanged
Events.Description: Fires when this UI visibility has been changed

ClassDef.Description: UIField is the abstract base class of all UI classes.
